## Checklist

<!-- Go through this checklist and mark items with [x] -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards (see CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have removed all debug/console statements

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly (README, docs/, etc.)
- [ ] I have added XML documentation to all public members
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md with my changes
- [ ] I have updated relevant code comments

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested edge cases and error conditions
- [ ] I have verified backwards compatibility

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have not introduced new dependencies without discussion
- [ ] If I added dependencies, they are properly documented
- [ ] All dependencies are from trusted sources

### UI Changes (if applicable)

- [ ] UI changes match the existing design system
- [ ] All text is properly sized and readable
- [ ] All interactive elements are keyboard accessible
- [ ] Changes work on different screen resolutions
- [ ] Dark theme is properly implemented
